name: Elegant Black Reindeers
description: Bring home a touch of timeless elegance with the Elegant Black Reindeers – a striking duo that effortlessly blends minimalist design with symbolic grace. Featuring sculptural antler details and crafted from solid metal, these pieces are both visually captivating and durable. More than just décor, they stand as symbols of positive energy and good luck. Whether placed on a console, shelf, or centerpiece display, they bring an artistic flair and a calming presence to your space.
features: Symbol of positive energy and good luck
materials: Premium-quality solid metal with a matte black finish.
dimensions: Large Reindeer: Height - 16 in | Width - 5  in
Small Reindeer: Height - 10 in | Width - 3.5  in
productCare: Wipe with a soft, dry cloth
Avoid water or chemical cleaners to maintain the finish
Handle with care to prevent scratches or dents
stylingTips: Pair with warm-toned candles or wooden accents to enhance the earthy appeal
Position near a window or spotlight to create dramatic shadows with the antler details
Ideal for entryway consoles, living room shelves, or festive table decor

name: Majestic Brass Elephant
description: The Majestic Brass Elephant is a timeless piece that brings together heritage, craftsmanship and symbolism. With its upward trunk and intricate engraved details, this compact décor accent is believed to usher in prosperity and positive energy. Whether displayed on a work desk, bookshelf or coffee table, it instantly adds warmth and charm to your space. It also makes for a thoughtful and auspicious gift for loved ones.
materials: 100% Metal with an antique gold finish.
productCare: Wipe gently with a soft, dry cloth
Avoid exposure to moisture and harsh cleaning agents
Brass may naturally patina over time, adding character to the piece
stylingTips: Place on a console or mantel as a solo accent or as part of a brass figurine collection
Pair with traditional lamps or wooden trays for a festive vignette
Use it as a meaningful addition to your work desk or puja space

Perfect as a thoughtful gift or a meaningful addition to your home décor, this figurine adds elegance and depth to any space.

productCare: Wipe gently with a soft, dry cloth
Avoid direct sunlight and moisture

Complements neutral or minimalist interiors

Makes a meaningful gift for loved ones who appreciate art and symbolism

description: The Golden Majestic Deer Duo is a stunning handcrafted piece made from solid brass, showcasing an elegant golden finish that radiates timeless beauty. Symbolising prosperity, this duo adds a refined touch to your home décor, bringing warmth and grace to any setting. It also makes a thoughtful gift for those who value elegance and meaningful symbolism.

Pair with family photos or soft lighting to enhance its symbolism

Crafted with an elegant gold metal finish, it radiates warmth and sophistication, while the solid white marble base adds stability and timeless charm. This figurine is a perfect gift or décor accent that celebrates enduring love and connection in a subtle yet striking way.

name: Golden Abstract Thinking Face
description: The Golden Abstract Thinking Face figurine is a striking symbol of insight and awareness. Featuring a unique abstract face and hand design, it captures the essence of thoughtful reflection. Finished in a radiant gold metallic tone and set on a sturdy white marble base, this piece combines durable craftsmanship with timeless elegance. Ideal as a meaningful gift or a sophisticated décor addition, it inspires contemplation and adds artistic flair to any space.
